text: Umusi ababeshi b’abagabo hamwe n’ababeshi b’abagore bazo vuga babwira abemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri bati:- nimu turindire kugira ngo turonke ahabona mumico yanyu, nabo bace babwirwa bati:- ni musubire inyuma yanyu muje kurondera umuco wanyu, hanyuma hashirwe hagati yabo uruzitiro rufise urugi, murirwo harimwo imigisha, no hanze k’uruhande yarwo rw’imbere yaho hari ibihano bikaze cane
